tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  survey_id UUID,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)
CREATE TABLE Survey (survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, survey_date DATE, satisfaction_rating INT);
CREATE TABLE Review (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, review_date DATE, review_text TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Analysis (analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, survey_id INT, review_id INT, analysis_date DATE, analysis_result TEXT);

CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    survey_date DATE,
    satisfaction_score INT,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    review_rating INT,
    review_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    review_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    survey_date DATE,
    satisfaction_rating INT,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    review_rating INT,
    review_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(100),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_data (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    review_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50)
)
